titleStmt.title: A perfect catalogue of all the Arch-bishops & Bishops in England and Wales, established by his Majesty King Charles the Second, ranked in their order, whereof the five first take place by Act of Parliament, the rest according to their consecration.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Pawley, at the Rainbow in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
